intro: Papuaea, commonly known as the papuaea plant, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Meliaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Southeast Asia and the Pacific Islands. The plant typically features broad, lance-shaped leaves and produces small, fragrant flowers. Papuaea species are often found in moist, shaded environments within tropical forests. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
